messages.subject: Well, hello stranger!
messages.msgSnippet: And welcome back Jim. Yes, I would like to get a transcript of the whole book as it were if possible.  There are several in the European NBTHK Collection
messages.messageBody:
And welcome back Jim.

Yes, I would like to get a transcript of the whole 'book' as it were if
possible. There are several in the European NBTHK Collection book
which I believe Hans put together. It would be a great reference. I
am trying to track down obscure texts, etc. for research, my own and
whoever is interested.
